name: Tanks! (Stephens Clan Gaming)
description:
This is a single keyboard game for one or two players. Computer controlled bots (COM's) can also be added, creating a chaotic last tank standing battle. Or team up with your favorite tanks and blast the others out of the game! 

Hint: Hold down your fire button to charge your shot and fire farther.


Player 1Player 2 (optional)MoveWASDArrow KeysFireSpace BarEnter

This game was based off of the tanks tutorial on Unity Learn.
